commit.message:
re PR c++/51226 ([c++0x] ICE with opaque enum and invalid template)

/cp
2013-05-08  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	PR c++/51226
	* parser.c (cp_parser_enum_specifier): Handle nested_name_specifier
	== error_mark_node.

/testsuite
2013-05-08  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	PR c++/51226
	* g++.dg/cpp0x/pr51226.C: New.

From-SVN: r198714
